admin_can_change_password_without_knowin: Administrator can change user password without knowing the current password.
after_changing_user_must_login_with_new_: After changing, the user must login with the new password.
name_must_be_at_least_2_characters: Name must be at least 2 characters
password_must_be_at_least_6_characters: Password must be at least 6 characters
username_must_be_at_least_3_characters: Username must be at least 3 characters
